title: TEMPORARY FIX TO CONNECTION ISSUE PLAGUING US
body:
UPDATE/EDIT: this is currently the only known workaround for this issue. You can't use the play button however, but at least you can login. RIP

I HAVE DISCOVERED A FIX!!!

1. OPEN LEAGUE
2. AFTER ERROR MESSAGE APPEARS DO NOT CLOSE LEAGUE
3. RIGHT CLICK THE ICON ON THE TASK-BAR AT THE BOTTOM OF YOUR MONITOR
4. CLICK "CLOSE WINDOW"
5. LEAGUE WILL ASK YOU IF YOU ARE SURE YOU WANT TO EXIT
6. CLICK NO
7. YOU WILL NOW BE ABLE TO LOGIN
8. GO GET YOUR PENTAKILLS FELLOW SUMMONERS
9. YOU'RE WELCOME
10. SCREENSHOTS BELOW FOR YOUR CONVEINIENCE

http://i.imgur.com/khInPUa.png[/img]

Actually, you are correct in saying its not a fix, it's a workaround of sorts to login. However, If you restart your computer, you can play. I am in a custom right now and have not lost connection yet after having restarted.

Update: Left the game and have still not had any issues.

Finally a solution. I like how throughout some threads some Riot employees are adamant that it was our network that was the issue and not their servers. I mean after a patch goes live and a lot of people can't connect you would think it would have to be related to the servers.
I have my play button back now, I think Riot has resolved the issue, any others?
It appears the rito gods have saved us. Both clients are now working. Praise be unto Rito!

Found a further solution, if you disconnect/reconnect your router after using this solution and you're logged into the client, you have a chance to get into a game lobby, but I don't know how it effects you in game, so take precautions when queuing up for games.
Any update on this?
